decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

Location Plan; PR/0521/FP3 - Existing Front and Side Elevations (dated May 2021); PR/0521/FP3 - Existing Rear and Side Elevations (dated May 2021); PR/0521/FP1 - Existing Ground Floor Plan (dated May 2021); PR/0521/FP2 - Existing First Floor & Loft Plans (dated May 2021); PR/0521/FP5 (dated May 2021).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | Prior to the commencement of the hereby approved development (excluding site clearance and demolition), details of the design of the secure cycle parking facilities for the occupants of, and visitors to, the development hereby approved shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. This cycle storage must provide space for a minimum of three (3) cycle spaces. These facilities shall be fully implemented and made available for use prior to the occupation of the development hereby permitted and shall thereafter be retained for use at all times.
REASON: To provide adequate bicycle storage to align with Ealing Sustainable Transport SPG and policy T4 and T5 of the London Plan (2021).

| Prior to commencement of the development (excluding site clearance and demolition), details of the design and operation of the facilities for the storage and removal of refuse (including details of the size and number of refuse and recycling bins) from the premises shall be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the Local Planning Authority and such facilities shall be provided before the building is first occupied.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupiers of the area and in the interests of the future occupants of the development in accordance with the Ealing Council's Waste Management Guidelines for Architects and Developers, as well as policies SI 8 of the London Plan (2021), 1.1 of the Adopted Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012); and 3.5, 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013).
description: Conversion of existing loft space into 1 self-conatined flat
